dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 17 ATS: To constitute the minority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To constitute the minority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

section.text: the following shall constitute the minority party's membership on the following committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen:

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Klobuchar (Ranking), Mr. Bennet, Ms. Smith, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Booker, Mr. Luján, Mr. Warnock, Mr. Welch, Mr. Fetterman, Mr. Schiff, Ms. Slotkin.
Mrs. Murray (Ranking), Mr. Durbin, Mr. Reed, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Coons, Mr. Schatz, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Van Hollen, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. Peters, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Ossoff.
Mr. Reed (Ranking), Mrs. Shaheen, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Kaine, Mr. King, Ms. Warren, Mr. Peters, Ms. Duckworth, Ms. Rosen, Mr. Kelly, Ms. Slotkin.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Warren (Ranking), Mr. Reed, Mr. Warner, Mr. Van Hollen, Ms. Cortez Masto, Ms. Smith, Mr. Warnock, Mr. Kim, Mr. Gallego, Ms. Blunt Rochester, Ms. Alsobrooks.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Cantwell (Ranking), Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Schatz, Mr. Markey, Mr. Peters, Ms. Baldwin, Ms. Duckworth, Ms. Rosen, Mr. Luján, Mr. Hickenlooper, Mr. Fetterman, Mr. Kim, Ms. Blunt Rochester.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Heinrich (Ranking), Mr. Wyden, Ms. Cantwell, Ms. Hirono, Mr. King, Ms. Cortez Masto, Mr. Hickenlooper, Mr. Padilla, Mr. Gallego.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on the Environment and Public Works:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Whitehouse (Ranking), Mr. Sanders, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Markey, Mr. Kelly, Mr. Padilla, Mr. Schiff, Ms. Blunt Rochester, Ms. Alsobrooks.
Mr. Wyden (Ranking), Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Bennet, Mr. Warner, Mr. Whitehouse, Ms. Hassan, Ms. Cortez Masto, Ms. Warren, Mr. Sanders, Ms. Smith, Mr. Luján, Mr. Warnock, Mr. Welch.
Mrs. Shaheen (Ranking), Mr. Coons, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Kaine, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Booker, Mr. Schatz, Mr. Van Hollen, Ms. Duckworth, Ms. Rosen.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Sanders (Ranking), Mrs. Murray, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Kaine, Ms. Hassan, Mr. Hickenlooper, Mr. Markey, Mr. Kim, Ms. Blunt Rochester, Ms. Alsobrooks.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Peters (Ranking), Ms. Hassan, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Fetterman, Mr. Kim, Mr. Gallego, Ms. Slotkin.
Mr. Warner (Ranking), Mr. Wyden, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. King, Mr. Bennet, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Ossoff, Mr. Kelly, Mr. Reed (ex officio), Mr. Schumer (ex officio).
Mr. Durbin (Ranking), Mr. Whitehouse, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Coons, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Booker, Mr. Padilla, Mr. Welch, Mr. Schiff.
Mr. Merkley (Ranking), Mrs. Murray, Mr. Wyden, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Warner, Mr. Kaine, Mr. Van Hollen, Mr. Luján, Mr. Padilla.
Mr. Padilla (Ranking), Mr. Schumer, Mr. Warner, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Ossoff, Mr. Bennet, Mr. Welch.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Markey (Ranking), Ms. Cantwell, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Booker, Mr. Coons, Ms. Hirono, Ms. Rosen, Mr. Hickenlooper, Mr. Schiff.
Mr. Blumenthal (Ranking), Mrs. Murray, Mr. Sanders, Ms. Hirono, Ms. Hassan, Mr. King, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Gallego, Ms. Slotkin.
Mrs. Gillibrand (Ranking), Ms. Warren, Mr. Kelly, Mr. Warnock, Mr. Kim, Ms. Alsobrooks.
Ms. Hassan (Ranking), Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. Kelly.
Mr. Coons (Ranking), Mr. Schatz, Mrs. Shaheen.
Mr. Schatz (Ranking), Ms. Cantwell, Ms. Cortez Masto, Ms. Smith, Mr. Luján.
